title: Her Protector
description: Grey Walters had always been the strong powerful man, a happily married man but now he has found a weakness Ella Rose. When Ella Rose walked into Grey Walters office to be his new Personal Assistant, she had no idea her life would change forever. Grey had a hidden past, a past he had kept hidden from his friends and wife. A past that his family left behind when he was just 12 years old. Now the past is coming back to haunt him, and he is going to do everything in his power to keep Ella Rose protected from his past, but can he? Grey Walters is a successful married business who was raised in a cult, his family left the cult due to one of the Life Ministers wanting to have a sexually relationship with Grey at 12 years old. Grey appears to be together, level headed but as the story develops and his relationship grows and break down with Ella Rose his past comes back to haunt him through nightmares, and flash backs of his past come back through the story.
author: Sarah J. Fox
